_comment: Research Memory Skill Configuration - All fields are now implemented and functional
_memory_directory_comment: Directory name for storing memory files (relative to project root)
_encoding_comment: File encoding for all text files (utf-8, gbk, etc.)
_csv_delimiter_comment: Delimiter for CSV files (comma, semicolon, tab)

bootstrap._recent_entries_count_comment: Number of recent devlog entries to show in bootstrap
bootstrap._include_todos_comment: Whether to include current TODOs in bootstrap context
bootstrap._suggest_work_plan_comment: Whether to generate work plan suggestions in bootstrap

logging._auto_timestamp_comment: Whether to automatically add timestamps to entries
logging._phase_sections_comment: Supported research phases for categorizing entries

search._max_results_comment: Maximum number of search results to return
search._include_context_comment: Whether to include surrounding context in search results
search._context_lines_comment: Number of context lines to include before/after matches
